T16D4437:294a-6: spos dkar rnams kyi bdug pa byas na myur du tshong 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T16D4437:294a-7: sgog pa zos na aa ru dang /
T16D4437:294a-8: ku ta btags na dri ma med par 'gyur ro //
T16D4437:294a-9: chang btungs nas durba btags na dri ma med par 'gyur ro //
T16D4437:294a-10: pa ro l'i'i khu ba btab na chang dkar por 'gyur ro //
T16D4437:294a-12: so so b'i ra btab na rang bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ro //
T16D4437:294a-13: k'a ra sum kha dkar po'i rtsa ba dang rma bya'i gzug phud kyi rtsa ba dang /
T16D4437:294a-14: gzhan gyis mi thub pa dkar po'i rtsa ba rnams
T16D4437:294a-15: gcig tu byas nas btags te grib ma la bskams
T16D4437:294a-16: pa'i ril bu khar bcug cing /
T16D4437:294a-17: lus la byug pa byas na g-yul las mtshon cha bzlog par byed do //
T16D4437:294a-18: skyu ru ra'i rtsa ba dang /
T16D4437:294a-19: me tog phyung nas khar bcug na g-yul las mtshon cha rengs par byed do //
T16D4437:294a-20: au ddhaddhag li tam ba n'a ni sikta mritti k'am
T16D4437:294a-21: gri hya dakto da ra ma dhye prak'i sya ya
T16D4437:294a-22: ta gri ha phat la sth'a yeta /
T16D4437:294a-23: ta tra aishmi k'a ya tanti /
T16D4437:294a-25: ba hu b'a ra briksha sya dakshi na s'a kh'am
T16D4437:294a-26: gri hya ka ra yi tv'a shrirga ma t'ishma sha
T16D4437:294a-29: lha ma bu chu gsher gyi chu dang /
T16D4437:294a-34: ga na ka'i sa bon dang /
T16D4437:294a-35: 'di dag gis bdugs pa'i ril bu sbyar te /
T16D4437:294a-36: bdug spos 'dis rnyed pa dang bcas pa'i tshong 'gyur [?] bar 'gyur ro //
T16D4437:294a-38: aom na mo tsanda ku sha ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a//
T16D4437:294a-39: 'di ni byams pa gling gi gzims khang du rgya
T16D4437:294a-40: dpe bzhugs pa las chos rje rin po che ngag
T16D4437:294a-41: gi dbang phyug bsod nams rnam rgyal dpal bzang po'i
T16D4437:294a-42: bka' bzhin du / zha lu lo ts'a ba dge
T16D4437:294a-43: slong chos skyong bzang pos rgya dpe bzhin ji ltar
T16D4437:294b-0: // / bla ma @294b dang sangs rgyas sman gyi bla
T16D4437:294b-1: drang srong tshe'i rig byed 'dzin pa rnams la phyag
T16D4437:294b-2: 'tshal lo // thog mar nad kyi mtshan nyid brtag pa ni //
T16D4437:294b-3: pho ba'i nad rnams rlung la brten /
T16D4437:294b-4: sems 'khrul pa dang za zir 'byung ba mkhris pa la brten /
T16D4437:294b-5: rang bzhin gyis 'khrul pa bad kan la brten /
T16D4437:294b-6: tshad pa ma 'ju ba la brten /
T16D4437:294b-7: rlung gi tshad pa'i nad yun gyi tshad zhag bdun /
T16D4437:294b-9: bad kan tshad ba zhag bcu gnyis /
T16D4437:294b-10: rlung tshad kyi brtag pa ni /
T16D4437:294b-11: tshigs rnams brdungs pa lta bur na /
T16D4437:294b-12: g-yal stong 'byung zhing bya snyong byed snying 'dod /
T16D4437:294b-15: mgo dang chu rgyus rtsib logs mur gong rkang mthil rnams lhag par na /
T16D4437:294b-19: mig dang sen mo shin tu dmar /
T16D4437:294b-21: de rnams tshang ba 'am shas chen nges par rlung dang ldan pa'o //
T16D4437:294b-22: rtags de rnams shas che zhing rtsar mkhris pa dang
T16D4437:294b-23: bad kan gnyis ka 'dug na 'dus pa'i rtags so
T16D4437:294b-25: chu yang yang 'tshag snying 'dod cing btsags tshe na zug kyang cung zad 'byung /
T16D4437:294b-28: kha'i nang dang lce sogs la thor pa chung ngu mang du 'byung /
T16D4437:294b-30: mig mnan pa lta bu 'degs dka'/
T16D4437:294b-32: mig dang sen mo mdog ser /
T16D4437:294b-35: de rnams tshang ba 'am shas che na mkhris pa ldan pa'o //
T16D4437:294b-36: rtags 'di rnams shas che zhing rtsar rlung rtsa dang
T16D4437:294b-37: bad kan gnyis ka 'dug na 'dus ba'i nad kyi
T16D4437:294b-38: rtags so // bad kan gyi rtags la /
T16D4437:294b-39: lus dang shes pa lci bas gang yang byed mi 'dod pa /
T16D4437:294b-40: dang kha 'gags shing zas gang la'ang bro ba med /
T16D4437:294b-41: mig mnan pa lta bur lci ba /
T16D4437:294b-43: lus la drod cung zad yod pa /
T16D4437:294b-46: mchil ma mang du 'byung zhing skyur dgos pa /
T16D4437:294b-47: lus mdog mdangs med thal kha dang tshi che /
T16D4437:295a-2: de rnams tshang ba'am shas che na bad kan yin zhing /
T16D4437:295a-3: gong gi rtags rnams phal cher tshang la rtsar rlung
T16D4437:295a-4: dang mkhris pa gnyis ka ldan pa 'dus pa'i rtags
T16D4437:295a-5: so // gzhan yang 'dus pa'i rtags la gtam chal chol smra /
T16D4437:295a-7: mig dmar zhing mchi ma 'dzag / lce 'gags so //
T16D4437:295a-8: nad glo bur ba'i rtags la /
T16D4437:295a-9: mig mdongs nas blta nan che zhing g-yo 'gul nyung /
T16D4437:295a-11: de ltar rtags dang rtsa mthun na rkyang pa dang /
T16D4437:295a-12: dper na rlung gi rtags la mkhris pa'i rtsa /
T16D4437:295a-13: mkhris pa'i rtags la rlung gi rtsa lta bu 'dug
T16D4437:295a-14: na mkhris rlung ste des rigs bsgres te shes par
T16D4437:295a-15: bya'o // rtsa la brtag pa la /
T16D4437:295a-16: rtsa ba rlung mkhris bad kan gsum gyi rtsa /
T16D4437:295a-17: de las gyes pa bcu bzhi ste /
T16D4437:295a-20: bad kan dang nye ba'i rlung /
T16D4437:295a-21: mkhris pa'i gnas su mkhris pa /
T16D4437:295a-24: bad kan dang nye ba'i mkhris pa /
T16D4437:295a-25: bad kan gyi gnas su bad kan /
T16D4437:295a-28: mkhris pa dang nye ba'i bad kan te bcu gnyis /
T16D4437:295a-29: gsum ga'i gnas su rgyu ba'i khrag dang chu'i rtsa ste bcu bzhi'o //
T16D4437:295a-30: de la rlung gi rtsa ni sbom la mgyogs /
T16D4437:295a-31: mkhris pa'i rtsa ni grims la mgyogs /
T16D4437:295a-32: bad kan gyi rtsa ni lhod la da la ba yin la /
T16D4437:295a-33: de yang zhogs pa lus ma 'khrugs shing zas gang
T16D4437:295a-34: yang ma zos gong du blta ste mkhrig ma'i gnyer
T16D4437:295a-35: ma dang po nas rim bzhin nam mkha'/
T16D4437:295a-39: sa lnga las nam mkha' dang sa'i gnas por ba'i
T16D4437:295a-40: rlung me chu gsum gyi gnas mtshon kan chag gsum
T16D4437:295a-41: gyi 'og tu rim pa ltar rlung mkhris bad kan
T16D4437:295a-42: gsum gyi gnas su bzung la /
T16D4437:295a-45: bad kan gyi gnas gyi rlung gsum /
T16D4437:295a-46: de yang rlung gnas rang gi rlung rtsa sarba sbrul gyi 'gros lta bur 'phar /
T16D4437:295a-47: mkhris gnas kyi rlung (bha ai pa) bya rog gi 'gros ltar 'phar /
T16D4437:295a-48: bad kan gnas kyi rlung rma (may'u ra) bya'i 'gros ltar 'phar /
T16D4437:295b-0: de bzhin du mkhris gnas rang gi mkhris rtsa (la ba)...sreg @295b pa 'phur ba ltar 'phar /
T16D4437:295b-1: rlung gnas kyi mkhris rtsa shig gi 'gros ltar 'phar /
T16D4437:295b-2: bad kan gnas kyi mkhris rtsa 'bab chu ltar 'phar ba /
T16D4437:295b-3: bad kan rang gnas kyi rtsa ngang pa'i rgyal po'i 'gros ltar 'phar /
T16D4437:295b-4: rlung gnas kyi bad kan gyi rtsa srin 'bu padma can gyi 'gros ltar 'phar /
T16D4437:295b-5: mkhris gnas kyi bad kan gyi rtsa sbal ba'i 'gros (dzum) ltar 'phar /
T16D4437:295b-6: khrag la'ang gsum ste rlung (p'a ni) gnas kyi khrag rtsa nya'i 'gros ltar 'phar /
T16D4437:295b-7: (ham sa r'a dza) mkhris gnas kyi khrag rtsa bye'u'i skad ltar 'phar /
T16D4437:295b-8: (dzo lu ka) bad kan gnas kyi khrag rtsa phu ron gyi 'gros ltar 'phar /
T16D4437:295b-9: chu la (mandu ka) gnyis te rlung gnas dang mkhris gnas kyi chu'i rtsa rta'i 'gros ltar 'phar /
T16D4437:295b-10: bad kan (ma tsha li) gnas kyi gnas kyi chu'i rtsa khyim bya'i 'gros ltar 'phar la /
T16D4437:295b-11: rlung (ci ri) gi gnas su sbrul gyi 'gros ltar
T16D4437:295b-12: 'phar na rang gnas su rang (ka b'u tra/) /'gros
T16D4437:295b-14: sreg pa'i 'gros ltar 'phar na mkhris rlung gi nad tshan (re wa) che zhing bcos dka'/
T16D4437:295b-16: (kukshu ti) shig gi 'gros ltar 'phar na mkhris rlung yin kyang tshan chung la bcos sla /
T16D4437:295b-17: go rim de bzhin ngang ba'i rgyal po sbal pa
T16D4437:295b-18: srin bu padma can gyi 'gros ltar 'phar na pad
T16D4437:295b-20: nya'i 'gros ltar 'phar na khrag rlung yin kyang tshan chung /
T16D4437:295b-21: bye'u ltar 'phar na khrag rlung 'bring po /
T16D4437:295b-22: phug ron ltar 'phar na khrag rlung gi nad babs lci /
T16D4437:295b-23: de bzhin du rta'i 'gros ltar 'phar na rlung gi chu gso sla /
T16D4437:295b-24: khyim bya'i 'gros ltar 'phar na gzhi che /
T16D4437:295b-25: mkhris pa'i gnas su sreg pa 'phur ba ltar 'phar
T16D4437:295b-26: na rang gnas su rang ste nad med kyi rtsa
T16D4437:295b-27: / sbrul dang rma bya'i 'gros bya rog gi skad
T16D4437:295b-28: gsum rim pa ltar mkhris rlung che 'bring chung gsum
T16D4437:295b-29: / / ngang pa'i rgyal po srin 'bu padma can /
T16D4437:295b-30: sbal pa gsum gyi 'gros ltar 'phar na bad mkhris che 'bring chung gsum /
T16D4437:295b-31: byi'u'i skad ltar 'phar na khrag mkhris chung ngu /
T16D4437:295b-32: nya dang khyim bya'i 'gros ltar 'phar na khrag mkhris tshan che /
T16D4437:296a-2: khyim bya'i 'gros ltar 'phar na gzhi che /
T16D4437:296a-3: bad kan gyi gnas su ngang pa'i rgyal po'i 'gros
T16D4437:296a-4: ltar 'phar na rang gnas su rang ste nad med
T16D4437:296a-5: / sbrul dang bya rog rma bya gsum rim pa ltar bad rlung che 'bring chung gsum /
T16D4437:296a-6: sreg pa shig chu gsum bad mkhris che 'bring chung gsum /
T16D4437:296a-7: nya byi'u phug ron gsum bad khrag che 'bring chung gsum /
T16D4437:296a-8: rta'i 'gros ltar 'phar na chu dang bad kan shas che /
T16D4437:296a-9: khyim bya'i 'gros ltar 'phar na chu dang bad kan yin kyang shas chung ngo /
T16D4437:296a-10: de yang mtshon gyi mas sner mkhris rtsa dang /
T16D4437:296a-11: dkan gyi yas sner rlung rtsa /
T16D4437:296a-12: dkan gyi mas sner bad kan gyi rtsa dang /
T16D4437:296a-13: chag gi yas sner mkhris pa'i rtsa 'phar na nye ba'i gnas yin pas skyon chung ngo //
T16D4437:296a-14: rlung gi gnas su mkhris rtsa shig gi 'gros ltar
T16D4437:296a-15: 'phar na rlung mkhris yin kyang bcos na myur du
T16D4437:296a-17: rlung gnas su bad kan gyi rtsa srin bu padma can gyi 'gres ltar 'phar na mgo na /
T16D4437:296a-18: glo dgog pa sogs 'byung zhing skyon chung yang ma
T16D4437:296a-19: bcos na ngang pa'i rgyal po'i 'gros ltar song dogs
T16D4437:296a-21: 'bral du nad zug gzer che yang rlung gi gnas
T16D4437:296a-22: su khrag gi rtsanya'i 'gros ltar 'phar na bcos kyang
T16D4437:296a-23: myur du bde zhing ma bcos kyang mi ring bar
T16D4437:296a-24: 'tsho ba'o // rlung gi gnas su chu'i rtsa rta'i
T16D4437:296a-25: 'gros lta bu 'phar na dbugs kha mi bde ba
T16D4437:296a-26: 'tsho ba'o // / mig dmar zhing mig 'dag mang ba sogs 'byung /
T16D4437:296a-27: mkhris pa'i gnas su rlung rtsa bya rog gi 'gros ltar 'phar na kha skam skom dad che /
T16D4437:296a-28: tshags tshigs sogs khol bur na yang gso sla /
T16D4437:296a-29: mkhris pa'i gnas su bad kan gyi rtsa sbal pa'i 'gros ltar 'phar na mgo bo na /
T16D4437:296a-30: kha nas mchi la ma yang yang 'bo dgos shing
T16D4437:296a-31: mkhris pa'ang cung zad skyug go / mkhris pa'i gnas
T16D4437:296a-32: su khrag gi rtsa byi'u'i skad ltar 'phar na lus
T16D4437:296a-33: la rtse yas byed ci nas khrag cung zad 'dzag
T16D4437:296a-34: pa dang / thor ba chung ngu 'byung /
T16D4437:296b-0: mig gi @296b mdangs dmar ser du 'ong ngo //
T16D4437:296b-1: mkhris pa'i gnas su chu'i rtsa rta'i 'gros lta bur
T16D4437:296b-3: / mig na zhing mig chu 'dzag go / bad
T16D4437:296b-4: kan gyi gnas su rlung gi rtsa rma bya'i 'gros
T16D4437:296b-5: ltar 'phar na lus grang shum byed cing rkang lag
T16D4437:296b-8: zhag chung zhing skya thalapho ba sbos pa dang 'khrog pa 'byung ngo //
T16D4437:296b-9: bad kan gyi gnas su mkhris pa'i rtsa 'bab chu'i 'gros ltar 'phar na glo dgog / brang tsha /
T16D4437:296b-11: bad kan gyi gnas su khrag gi rtsa phug ron gyi 'gros ltar 'phar na lus drod che /
T16D4437:296b-13: 'og sgor khrag cung zad 'dzag /'phongs lug pa sogs 'byung /
T16D4437:296b-14: bad kan gyi gnas su rtsa khyim bya'i 'gros ltar 'phar na tshigs na zhing cung zad skrangs pa /
T16D4437:296b-15: lus kyi mdangs mi gsal zhing tshi che ;
T16D4437:296b-17: rlung gi gnas su mkhris pa'i rtsa sreg pa 'phur ba lta bur 'phar na /
T16D4437:296b-20: lus las rdul mang du 'dzag / lus gyong /
T16D4437:296b-22: chu ser por 'bab pa sogs 'byung zhing 'di ni
T16D4437:296b-23: mkhris rlung gi gtso bo ste bcos la bzab bo
T16D4437:296b-24: // rlung gi sa ru mkhris pa'i rlung gi rtsa bya rog gi 'gros lta bur 'phar na /
T16D4437:296b-28: lus la thor pa dang shu ba sogs 'byung ngo //
T16D4437:296b-29: rlung gi gnas su mkhris pa'i bad kan gyi rtsa sbal pa'i 'gros ltar 'phar na /
T16D4437:296b-36: rlung gi gnas su mkhris pa'i khrag gi rtsa byi'u'i 'gros ltar 'phar na /
T16D4437:296b-38: tshags tshigs dang mgo bo na /
T16D4437:296b-40: rlung gi gnas su mkhris pa'i chu'i rtsa rta'i 'gros ltar 'phar na /
T16D4437:296b-41: so rnyil skrangs shing chu ser dang khrag 'byung /
T16D4437:297a-4: rlung gi gnas su bad kan gyi rtsa ngang pa'i
T16D4437:297a-5: rgyal po'i 'gros ltar 'phar na lus brdungs shing gcus
T16D4437:297a-9: chu gtong dka' ba sogs 'byung zhing 'di ni bad rlung gi gtso bo ste bcos la bzab bo //
T16D4437:297a-10: rlung gi gnas su bad kan gyi rlung gi rtsa
T16D4437:297a-11: rma bya'i 'gros ltar 'phar na pho ba gcus pa
T16D4437:297a-13: rked pa dang chu rgyus na /
T16D4437:297a-15: rlung gi gnas su bad kan gyi mkhris pa'i rtsa 'bab chu'i 'gros ltar 'phar na brang tsha /
T16D4437:297a-18: mig dang sen mo'i mdog ljang khur snang ba /
T16D4437:297a-20: rlung gi gnas su bad kan gyi khrag gi rtsa phug ron gyi 'gros ltar 'phar na /
T16D4437:297a-21: rdul 'dzag / shu ba dang thor pa 'ong //
T16D4437:297a-22: mig dmar zhing 'byed 'dzums nyung ba sogs 'byung ngo //
T16D4437:297a-23: rlung gi gnas su bad kan gyi chu'i rtsa khyim bya'i 'gros ltar 'phar na mig 'grib /
T16D4437:297a-27: za 'phrug long zhing brad pa dang chu ser 'dzag
T16D4437:297a-28: / pho bar srin 'bu 'phel ba sogs 'byung ngo
T16D4437:297a-29: // mkhris gnas su rlung gi rtsa sbrul lta bur 'phar na /
T16D4437:297a-30: lus kyi tshags tshigs brdungs pa ltar na /
T16D4437:297a-32: kha skom zhing thor pa mang /
T16D4437:297a-35: pho ba na ba sogs 'byung zhing 'di ni mkhris rlung gtso bo ste bcos la bzab pa gces /
T16D4437:297a-36: mkhris gnas su rlung gi mkhris pa'i rtsa shig gi 'gros ltar 'phar na /
T16D4437:297a-40: kha rlungs dang rkang mthil drod che ba sogs 'byung /
T16D4437:297a-41: mkhris gnas su rlung gi bad kan gyi rtsa srin bu pad ma can ltar 'phar na /
T16D4437:297b-0: khar ro kha ba @297b sogs 'byung ngo //
T16D4437:297b-1: mkhris gnas su rlung gi khrag rtsa nya'i 'gros ltar 'phar na /
T16D4437:297b-2: lus mdog dmar zhing ba spu'i bu ga nas khrag
T16D4437:297b-3: kyang cung zad 'jag / mig chu mang ba sogs
T16D4437:297b-4: 'byung ngo // mkhris gnas su rlung gi rtsa rta'i 'gros ltar 'phar na /
T16D4437:297b-6: yan lag skam zhing tshigs dang gdong skrangs /
T16D4437:297b-7: dri chu khrag ltar bab pa sogs 'byung /
T16D4437:297b-8: mkhris gnas su bad kan gyi rtsa ngang pa'i rgyal po'i 'gros ltar 'phar na khar ro mngar /
T16D4437:297b-10: khog par zo ba'i zho drag chags pa lta bu 'byung ngo //
T16D4437:297b-11: lus kyi gting drod cung zad che zhing tshags tshigs sogs khol bur na /
T16D4437:297b-12: mkhris skran 'cha' ba sogs 'byung ste bad mkhris kyi
T16D4437:297b-13: gtso bo yin pas bcos la gzab pa gces so
T16D4437:297b-14: // mkhris pa'i gnas su bad kan gyi rlung gi rtsa rma bya'i 'gros ltar 'phar na /
T16D4437:297b-16: lus la rdul 'byung zhing dri mi zhim /
T16D4437:297b-19: mkhris pa'i gnas su bad kan gyi mkhris rtsa chu'i 'gros lta bur 'phar na /
T16D4437:297b-23: khrag cung zad skyug pa sogs 'byung ngo //
T16D4437:297b-24: mkhris pa'i gnas su bad kan gyi khrag rtsa phug ron gyi 'gros ltar 'phar na /
T16D4437:297b-29: mkhris pa'i gnas su bad kan gyi chu'i rtsa khyim bya'i 'gros lta bur 'phar na /
T16D4437:297b-32: ma 'ju ba'i nad dang 'gro 'dug dka' ba sogs 'byung /
T16D4437:297b-33: bad kan gyi gnas su rlung gi rtsa sbrul gyi 'gros ltar 'phar na /
T16D4437:297b-38: chu'i mdog ser ba sogs 'byung ste 'di ni bad rlung gi rtsa ba yin pas gzab bar bcos /
T16D4437:297b-39: bad kan gyi gnas sa rlung gi mkhris rtsa shig gi 'gros ltar 'phar na /
T16D4437:298a-3: bad kan gyi gnas su rlung gi bad kan gyi
T16D4437:298a-4: rtsa srin bu pad ma can gyi 'gros ltar 'phar
T16D4437:298a-5: na / be snabs skyug cing glo che /
T16D4437:298a-6: skya rbab dang mig 'dag mang ba sogs 'byung ngo /
T16D4437:298a-7: bad kan gyi gnas su rlung gi khrag gi rtsa nya'i 'gros ltar 'phar na /
T16D4437:298a-9: dangs ma skams pas lus stobs nyams /
T16D4437:298a-11: nyin re mos kyis na ba'o //
T16D4437:298a-12: bad kan gyi gnas su rlung gi chu'i rtsa rta'i 'gros ltar 'phar na /
T16D4437:298a-13: pags nad khol bu na ba sen mo btab kyang reg pa mi tshor ba /
T16D4437:298a-15: dangs ma 'dzag / lus mgo mjug thams cad na ba sogs 'byung /
T16D4437:298a-16: bad kan gyi gnas su mkhris pa'i rtsa sreg pa 'phur ba ltar 'phar na /
T16D4437:298a-19: zas skom mi 'dod pa dang chu skyur skyug / lus drod che ba sogs 'byung ste /
T16D4437:298a-20: 'di yang bad mkhris gyi gtso bo yin pas bcos la bzab /
T16D4437:298a-21: bad kan gyi gnas su mkhris pa'i rlung rtsa bya rog gi 'gros ltar 'phar na /
T16D4437:298a-23: mas rlung gyen du ldog / gzhang 'brum 'ong ba sogs 'byung /
T16D4437:298a-24: bad kan gyi gnas su mkhris pa'i bad kan gyi rtsa sbal pa'i 'gros ltar 'phar na /
T16D4437:298a-27: lus dri mi zhim pa sogs 'byung /
T16D4437:298a-28: bad kan gyi gnas su mkhris pa'i khrag gi rtsa byi'u'i skad ltar 'phar na /
T16D4437:298a-31: rtsi ba logs dang mchin pa na /
T16D4437:298a-32: dang kha mi bde zhing zas mi 'ju ba sogs 'byung /
T16D4437:298a-33: bad kan gyi gnas su mkhris pa'i chu'i rtsa rta'i 'gros ltar 'phar na /
T16D4437:298b-2: kha 'grig / tshigs re mos su na ba sogs 'byung ngo //
T16D4437:298b-3: mkhris pa'i gnas su mkhris par nga gi rtsa sbal pa'i 'gros dang khrag rtsa bye'u'i skad ltar dang /
T16D4437:298b-4: rlung gi mkhris rtsa shig gi 'gros gsum res 'jog
T16D4437:298b-5: tu 'phar na 'dus pa ste kha skom zhing 'grig
T16D4437:298b-8: shes pa mi gsal na de ni myur du 'chi zhing mi 'tsho'o //
T16D4437:298b-9: bad kan gyi gnas su bad kan rang gi rtsa
T16D4437:298b-10: ngang pa'i rgyal po'i 'gros dang rlung gi mkhris rtsa
T16D4437:298b-12: mkhris pa'i bad kan gyi rtsa sbal pa'i 'gros gsum res 'jog du 'bar na /
T16D4437:298b-13: de yang nad gsum 'dus pa ste mi 'tsho'o //
T16D4437:298b-16: mgo dang tshags tshigs na ba /
T16D4437:298b-17: so dang lce nag por song ba /
T16D4437:298b-18: pho ba dang stod la gzer ba sogs nad rlung mkhris bad kan gsum ga'i rtags tshang zhing /
T16D4437:298b-19: rlung gi gnas su bad kan gyi rtsa ngang pa'i rgyal po'i 'gros ltar 'phar na /
T16D4437:298b-21: rlung mkhris bad kan gsum ka'i gnas su 'gros rnams
T16D4437:298b-22: nges med sna tshogs su rgyu na nad yun ring
T16D4437:298b-24: rlung gi gnas su rlung dang /
T16D4437:298b-25: mkhris pa'i gnas su 'ang rlung rtsa 'phar na ma 'ju ba'i nad ste gso sla'o //
T16D4437:298b-26: de ltar rtsa'i dbye ba rnams ma nor bar gtan
T16D4437:298b-27: la phab ste nang gang yin ngos zin pa dang
T16D4437:298b-28: / de'i sman dang spyod lam rnams bya ba ni gnad do //
T16D4437:298b-29: zhes drang srong chen po da nandra ste sbyin pa'i
T16D4437:298b-30: dbang pos mdzad pa'i rtsa brtag cing gtan la 'bebs
